pages.title: ZeroLiner
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Den-O (2007, TV show)$(br2)Spawns throughout the Sands of Time$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/zeronos_cards#zeronos_altair_card)Zeronos Altair Card$(/l)$(li)4-6 $(l:den_o/items/imagin_sand)Imagin Sand$(/l) (12%)$(li)3-7 $(l:den_o/items/zeronos_cards#zeronos_plat_card)Zeronos Plat Cards$(/l) (40%)$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/zeronos_cards#zeronos_altair_card)Zeronos Altair Card$(/l) (24%)$(li)1 $(l:den_o/items/zeronos_cards#zeronos_vega_card)Zeronos Vega Card$(/l) (24%)
